segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s almost funny how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but I’m not sure how much longer this can go on.
segments.speaker: PAR
